name: Selva
description:
"Jump out and journey through the jungle while delivering essentials to local residents!" 

Selva is a single-player platformer in which you journey around a jungle, hopping from platform to platform and delivering packages to locals in your area. Enjoy the trees and the wind blowing past your face as you deliver a package.

How to Play:

  • Controller (Xbox): 
    • Left Analog Stick: Horizontal Movements
    • Press “A” for Jump/Double Jump
    • Hold “B” for Glide
    • Press “Y” to Interact
    • Press “X” to Start
